channel.title: Eric Kryski
channel.description: Read Eric Kryski's musings on design, development, finance and entrepreneurship

item.title: Taxation of Employee Stock Options
item.description: A practical guide to how stock options are taxed in Canada—when you pay, what you owe, and key differences for employees vs. contractors.
item.content:encoded: A practical guide to how stock options are taxed in Canada—when you pay, what you owe, and key differences for employees vs. contractors.
item.author: hello@erickryski.com (Eric Kryski)

item.title: Sales Tax 101 for Canadian Startups
item.description: A practical guide to navigating GST, HST, PST, and international sales tax for Canadian startups selling online—whether physical goods, SaaS, or services.
item.content:encoded: A practical guide to navigating GST, HST, PST, and international sales tax for Canadian startups selling online—whether physical goods, SaaS, or services.
item.author: hello@erickryski.com (Eric Kryski)
